mapper.select:
SELECT m.member_name AS nameInput, m.member_birthday AS yearInput, m.member_address AS addressInput, b.brief_history_education AS educationInput, b.brief_history_career AS careerInput, b.brief_history_certificate AS certificateInput, b.brief_history_upload_path AS imageAddress
FROM member m INNER JOIN brief_history b ON m.member_no = b.member_no AND m.member_no = #{member_no}
SELECT tech_category_name, tech_category_no FROM tech_category WHERE tech_category_delete_yn = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tech_category WHERE tech_category_delete_yn = 1
SELECT tech_name FROM tech WHERE tech_category_no = #{i} AND tech_delete_yn = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tech(member_no, tech_category_no, tech_name) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{categoryName}, #{skillNameInput})
mapper.select: SELECT tech_name, tech_no FROM tech WHERE tech_category_no = #{categoryName} AND tech_delete_yn = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO education(member_no, education_name, education_department, education_status, education_startdate, education_enddate, education_etc, education_upload_path) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{nameInput}, #{departmentInput}, #{status}, #{admissionInput}, #{graduatedInput}, #{etcInput}, #{imageAddress})
INSERT INTO company (member_no, company_name, company_startdate, company_enddate, company_upload_path) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{nameInput}, #{joinInput}, #{leaveInput}, #{imageAddress})
INSERT INTO career (company_no, career_responsibility, career_description, career_department) VALUES (#{companyName}, #{taskInput}, #{careerInput}, #{departmentInput})

INSERT INTO academy (member_no, academy_course, academy_content, academy_academy, academy_startdate, academy_enddate, academy_status_yn, academy_upload_path) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{curriculumInput}, #{contentInput}, #{nameInput}, #{startInput}, #{endInput}, #{status}, #{imageAddress});

INSERT INTO certificate (member_no, certificate_name, certificate_organization, certificate_pass_yn, certificate_issue_date, certificate_upload_path) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{nameInput}, #{certAutorityInput}, #{status}, #{dateInput}, #{imageAddress});
